message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate your product, I would like to stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in this range?
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I can see that you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $130. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still committed to staying within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Could we possibly reach an agreement within this range?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $125. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I appreciate your efforts in trying to accommodate my budget. I am still aiming to stay within my limit of $120. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Let's see if we can come to an agreement within this range.
